sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 新政策从明年开始实行。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xīn zhèngcè cóng míngnián kāishǐ shíxíng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La nouvelle politique sera mise en oeuvre à partir de l'année prochaine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The new policy will be implemented starting next year.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā jīntiān de biǎoxiàn hěn chūsè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Sa performance aujourd'hui était excellente.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His performance today was excellent.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他的努力最终获得了成功。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de nǔlì zuìzhōng huòdé le chénggōng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ses efforts ont finalement abouti au succès.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His efforts finally achieved success.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 警察正在调查这个案件。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jǐngchá zhèngzài diàochá zhège ànjiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La police enquête sur cette affaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The police are investigating this case.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīngjì fāzhǎn hěn kuài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'économie se développe rapidement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The economy is developing rapidly.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Hěn duō rén fǎnduì zhège jìhuà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Beaucoup de gens s'opposent à ce plan.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Many people oppose this plan.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 老师分配了各组的任务。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Lǎoshī fēnpèi le gè zǔ de rènwu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le professeur a assigné les tâches à chaque groupe.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The teacher assigned tasks to each group.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yǐjīng zuòchū le juédìng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous avons déjà pris une décision.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We have already made a decision.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xūyào qù lǐfà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai besoin d'aller chez le coiffeur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I need to get a haircut.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xiàmiàn qǐng kàn jùtǐ nèiróng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez voir le contenu détaillé ci-dessous.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please see the specific content below.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这家工厂生产汽车零件。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiā gōngchǎng shēngchǎn qìchē língjiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette usine produit des pièces automobiles.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This factory produces car parts.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 科学家们正在进行试验。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Kēxuéjiāmen zhèngzài jìnxíng shìyàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les scientifiques mènent des expériences.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Scientists are conducting experiments.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shuāngfāng kāishǐ le hépíng tánpàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les deux parties ont commencé des négociations de paix.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Both parties have started peace negotiations.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī cì nánwàng de tǐyàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'était une expérience inoubliable.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This was an unforgettable experience.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèlǐ de tǔ hěn féiwò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le sol ici est très fertile.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The soil here is very fertile.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xūyào tiáozhěng wǒ de jìhuà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je dois ajuster mon plan.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I need to adjust my plan.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 吸烟对健康有很大危害。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xīyān duì jiànkāng yǒu hěn dà wēihài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Fumer est très nocif pour la santé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Smoking is very harmful to health.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 互联网加快了信息传播的速度。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Hùliánwǎng jiākuài le xìnxī chuánbō de sùdù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Internet a accéléré la vitesse de diffusion de l'information.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The internet has accelerated the speed of information dissemination.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tāmen wòshǒu wènhǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ils se sont serré la main pour se saluer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: They shook hands to greet each other.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xīwàng nǐ néng lái cānjiā.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'espère que tu pourras venir participer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I hope you can come and participate.
